sort
Interface SortIF

All Known Implementing Classes:
QuickSort, SelectionSort, Strategy
public interface SortIF

This interface defines the methods that each sorting class must have.

Method Summary

          Identification.
 void sort(java.lang.Comparable[] data, int l, int r)

Method Detail

sort

public void sort(java.lang.Comparable[] data,
                 int l,
                 int r)
Sort a slice of an array of comparable objects. The elements of the array are swapped among themselves until the array is sorted.
Parameters:
data - The array to be sorted.
left - Index of first element of the slice.
right - Index of last element of the slice.

info

public java.lang.String info()
Identification.
Returns:
A string identifying the sorting algorithm.
